Posts.Content: Hello every one I've had my operation on Wednesday the 2cd April go back the 9th to get my dressings off n go back n see Mr Clark on the 15th I just hope it's good news n I'am cancer free I'am sorry but I'am full of twist as my boob hurts under my arm hurts I cry at any thing I'am worn out I hate how I am feeling I have no get up n go I feel dizzy I feel sick I feel light headed I'am not sleeping on a night I'am so very sorry but I'am just full of twist I'am so fed up I could scream n stamp my feet hope every one is keeping good best wishes Yvonne xxxxx
Posts.Title: Had my operation

Posts.Content: its one since I had breast cancer and still dealing with all the baggage that comes along with breast cancer. I seen my BCN on Monday because I have been having problems with my breast after my BCN examened she said I have a lump it's in the same breast she said that she did not know what it was so she is going to send me for scans and a biopsy. The first time I had breast cancer I seemed to cope I seemed stronger and I don't even know yet if it is cancer I just dont know what to think i'am trying so hard to keep everything together for my poor family I don't know what to do and I know I can't do anything until I find out what I am dealing with love Yvonne xxxxx
Posts.Title: This time I think i'am going fall apart

Posts.Content: Morning Ella50 how's you? Thanks for your reply I'am the same lower back, knees, ankles, hot flushes & weigh gain I used to be in a comfy 10 now I'am in a size 14 it gets me down so much but I know I need the drug because it's going stop the cancer coming back take good care & have a fabulous day love Yvonne xxxxx
Posts.Title: Letrozole are dreadful

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friend I am sending you all my love & hugs , you can't see us all sitting next to you but we are with you by your side we love you so very much my lovely xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Feeling Totally Demoralised!

Posts.Content: Hello every one these Letrozole are making my joints so very very painful any one else suffering & any advice ? I can't understand why I need them any way my operation & Radiotherapy was a success so why do I need Letrozole for 5 years any answers please love n hugs Yvonne xxxx
Posts.Title: Letrozole are dreadful

Posts.Content: Thank you for your advice I was so shattered last nite & could not sleep for the pain in my joints & I tuck it out on my Letrozole tablets but this morning is another brite sunny fabulous day hope every one has a good day love n hugs Yvonne xxxx
Posts.Title: Letrozole are dreadful

Posts.Content: You are so right about the roller coaster thank you so much you would think that you could read my mind thank you xxxx
Posts.Title: Very very bad day

Posts.Content: Hello every one hope every one is ok? I've had a very very bad day to day, don't know why? I feel like I have gone mad , or are about to go mad, I hate my self for been so stupid , being out of control, iam so mad with my self because I am so immature . Iam 53 years old was diagnosed with breast cancer in February & I was so in control of every thing is had the odd cry odd set back odd down day but I held every thing together . To day it went for my 4th session of Radiotherapy and this is how thick I am at the hospital I suddenly realised I HAVE BREAST CANCER . I could not wait to get home got home started walking round house saying to my self in am in control my two daughters called and I just had floods of tears & I could not stop then my hubby walks in from work & I ended up having words with him I know I've up set him but he just keeps saying "don't worry about it" I know I've up set him I've told him that I am sorry but don't know what an earth come over me & I explained to my daughters that to day for the first time it hit me I am getting treatment for breast cancer. I sailed thro my operation scans & every thing else but now on my 4th day of radiotherapy it's just hit me , I should of been like this when I was first diagnosed not now I just can't understand all this I just want to be in control & I want to go back in time to yesterday when I was in control & evert one was happy xxx
Posts.Title: Very very bad day

Posts.Content: Thank you my lovely people kept telling me how brave I was & I just used to push it a side or become very embarrassed by it but to day it's just hit me and I am so pleased I've got this site because it keeps me human it keeps me safe it's so good to know other people think like me xxxx
Posts.Title: Very very bad day

Posts.Content: Hello all my lovely friends hope every one is having a good day, if your having a bad day take your magic tissue out your invisible magic pocket and let your magic tissue comfort you . On the 2nd of April I had my lump & some glands removed , my question is , when will this blue dye / stuff come off my boob as it don't seen to be fading or coming off I'am in bath every day but it's still there I've got half a boob & it's blue if it was gone & could see my normal skin I think I may feel better about my boob Love n magic hugs to every one love Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: Need to ask a silly question please

Posts.Content: Thank you my lovely friends I can't believe I've washed n washed to try & get the blue off my boob & it's inside ha ha I've just laughed so much what am I like some times I do wish I was intelligent instead of being so thick thank you so much xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Need to ask a silly question please

Posts.Content: Hello I know I'am been stupid I'am having a bad morning I feel sick with breaking my wrist on Wednesday it's so painful I can't drive I've got a pot on thinking about the start of my treatment for breast cancer hav opp on the 2nd April I've had a few tears n still crying I can't stop I've tried 2 pull my self together but can't I'am so sorry because I'am not good company this morning xxx
Posts.Title: I want my mum n dad

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friends thank goodness for this site it's so difficult some days when your having a bad day & every thing seems to be going wrong and to feel all alone as well it's so hard to dust your self down and start again. And people do presume that your coping great so they take steps back it's so hard when other things are going on in your life as well it must be impossible to move & cope with cancer all at the same time I could not have coped with that I'am just so very glad I've got this site to talk on it's helped me so much and is still helping me I've had a good Easter but today I've been shatted worn out under my arm hurts were glands were removed my boob is sore were doc tuck lump out my wrist is so painful as I broke it weeks ago I go for a body scan on the 6th May don't know wat 2 expect go to The Freeman Hospital the 8th of May & get dates to start my Radiotherapy don't know what to expect from this appointment it's the appointment u get just so u can start your Radiotherapy Friends do presume your coping so you must b better now it takes a very wise and understanding person to presume your not coping , you are worrying , you are screaming in side , you do cry when your alone , you cry when you shut the bathroom door & step in the bath refusing to look in your mirror at your poor damaged boob , it takes a wise loving caring person to know all this but there is some people like this , we talk to each other every time we all come together and talk on here we do exist my lovely friends take good care love & magic hugs to every one love Yvonne xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Feel a bit unimportant

Posts.Content: Its only one ago I was diagnosed with Breast cancer I had my operation April the 2nd then my rads so surly Breast cancer can't come back this fast? Love Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: Seen my BCN today ??

Posts.Content: hello my lovely friends I went to the hospital today to see my BCN I don't know why I worried all over the week end about wasting my BCN time because she was lovely, supporting & fabulous , any way ive got fluid & myBCN has found a new LUMP she don't know what lump is so she going to send me an appointment for a scan & a biopsy my poor hubby & two girls are passed them selves with worry I'am not worried I'am trying to keep normality so my hubby & 2 daughters can see I'am fine love & hugs to everyone love Yvonne xxxxx
Posts.Title: Seen my BCN today ??

Posts.Content: hi everyone I went for my 2nd yearly check up & got the all clear on my breast , the problem is now something else, our son Arron died last year on the 21st of April in his bedroom in his bed he was only 32 years old & in December I started to bleed down below & a very dreadful discharge I put it down to stress & thought it will stop & it stopped & started but has got much worse so I went to see my nurse in March she tuck a swob & said I had o see my GP I went today & the results of my swob have come back negative no infection my GP said I needed an urgent appointment to see a doctor at hospital to rule out cancer so I go on Thursday the 5th of May & last year on the 5th of May it was our Arron's funeral years ago I got pre cancer cells down below had lazed treatment & I've never had any more problems till now I'm 55 years old & I stopped bleeding when I was 40 but since March I have been bleeding all the time with a dreadful embarrassing discharge I'm trying to stop my imagination running away with me thinking its cancer but no infection has showed up I'm still bleeding my GP says I need an urgent appointment at hospital I'm in recovery for breast cancer now for 2 years so what else can it be I think to my self it must be cancer I just don't know what to think anymore love Yvonne xxxxxx
Posts.Title: I just don't know what to do or think??????

Posts.Content: Morning Rebecca hope it's a good one 4 u pet . I'am just so frustrated with it I used to be so busy & now it takes me 2 hrs on a morning to feel awake & I know if it's going to b a good day or a bad day I just know by the way I feel . I just never thought cancer would have so much baggage I feel gulity some times I don't know why as I never give it to my self & I never asked for it my hubby & family & friends are so great but I know it gets my hubby down at times & I try to push my self to make things better but end up making things worse because I feel even more worn out & I end up crying . I'am waiting to start my Radiotherapy 15 sessions they say it makes u even more worn out so don't know how I will feel I keep thinking when will I be able to return to work my hubby just keeps saying not yet so days are fabulous & some days r so crap but I'am trying to be more positive about my days & I would be so lost with out this site as no one in my family has had cancer so it's all new my daughter is fabulous on my bad days she is the mum n I seem to b the daughter & I worry about that I could go on n on my lovely friend but I won't you take good care of your self hope u have loads n loads of good fabulous days love Yvonne xx
Posts.Title: When will I be "ME" again ???

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friends how's every one keeping today ? When will I be ME again? Will I ever be ME again? Befor I was diagnosed with breast cancer , I worked full time , permeant nite shift as a care assistant in a nursing home . Did all my own decorating , Helped my hubby with 7 pigeon lofts , Walked my dog , Shopping , house work , cooking I was on the go all the time I had a busy life . Now I'am on the sick , can't help with pigeon lofts , some of my rooms need decorating but I can't do them , if I go shopping I'am done in 4 day , I had my operation on the 2nd of April lump removed & some glands, I go the 8th of May for my appointment to make sure I'am ok to start my Radiotherapy , I am always worn out I just can't do any thing as I have no energy I just can't understand this I should be starting to pick up b4 now but I think I'am getting worse , I try so much to do what I used to do but I just get so worn out I am starting to think some thing is wrong some were this is not right , and I've aged so much some times when looking in a mirror I don't know who this old lady is looking back , how long is it going to take for me to be ME again Take care every one love n hugs always Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: When will I be "ME" again ???

Posts.Content: Morning my lovely friends hope your all having a fabulous morning a massive thank you for all the understanding replys and caring kind words I'am so pleased I can talk freely & be my self on this life line site I never knew it existed until I was diagnosed with breast cancer hope all my lovely caring friends has a good morning xx
Posts.Title: When will I be "ME" again ???

Posts.Content: Hi flute Your an amazing individual human being , you have been to hell & back , How did you cope with all of "The Black Days" You are truly an inspiration , You have had so much to deal with, your my Hero girl thank goodness you have joined our lovely , helpful , understanding , supportive , reassuring help line , thank goodness . You , your body & your inner self has had so very much to cope with but now your inner self needs nursing back to being health & happy you mite find it helpful going to see your GP , talk to your GP tell your GP how your feeling truthfully . You may find it helpful talking to MicMillian nurses they are fabulous . You are a very special lady , Your very caring , supportive , understanding , Always help others , but now it's time to give your very special qualities to your self , it's time for you now my lovely friend . Keep in touch , keep writing posts as your an inspiration , I am sending you a special magic tissue , we all need a magic tissue some time take good care love n hugs always my lovely friend xx
Posts.Title: I feel so alone

Posts.Content: Hi did any one manage some sleep? Hope so I had a couple of hours & up now as can't lie in bed wide awake any more going try sitting up to see if I can get my legs to be pain free I've got toothache in my knees these tablets side effects are driving me round the bend love n hugs always Yvonne xxxx
Posts.Title: Can't sleep

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friends hope every one is having a good day, you know I contact my BCN because my boob never felt right , I went to see her last Friday & she was so very nice & kind & very supportive, She said I had a lump but not sure what it was so she said I will send you an appointment I've got my appointment I go this Tuesday at 10am What will they do? Will I have a mammogram or will I have a scan? I truly believe my cancer has not come back because it's only a year since I had breast cancer It can't come back that fast can it? In fact I still have a blue boob so how an earth could cancer come back already? Lots of love Yvonne xxxxx
Posts.Title: I've got my appointment

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friends hope you are all good I can't sleep the pain in my joints is dreadful with Letrozole & the hot flushes xxxx
Posts.Title: Can't sleep

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friend first of all I am sending u a massive hug wrapped up in loads of love & best wishes 2nd a massive big congratulations to U babe for fighting your way thro treatment & all the baggage that comes with it . I wish I had some magic words , answers but sadly I don't all I can say is it's very normal to feel the way u r feeling I don't know how long it will last . Don't fight your self or your body , If u want to cry then have a good cry, If u want 2 sleep then sleep , If your body says " we"re doing nowt today " then do nowt I finished all my treatment a few wks ago & on my last treatment I exasperated The heavens 2 open The world 2 stop The old me just 2 pop rite up & say "yip pee I'am back" But none of this happened I thought it was me I got so mad with my self I still have days when I feel like it now So please don't beat your self up, you have been to hell & back but be kind to your self as this is the start of a new set of treatment plan it's such a long process I hope u have loads of good days & wen your bad days r with u my lovely cry , love your self your a very brave lady . I read a comment on here not so long ago & it changed my life some one wrote "it's not about waiting for the storm to clear, it's about learning to dance in the rain" I could hug the lady who wrote this Best wishes my lovely friend love n hugs always Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: End of chemo .. Why am I so low ??

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friends , some of my family & friends think I'am over the worsed now so they think it's time for me to pull my self together but having breast cancer has changed me befor when I was having a bad day I would just be like a robot & do what every one wanted me to do not now I say " I'am having a bad day I don't feel well I'am going to chill out on sofa or stay in bed" it's so easy to fall back in that trap of Your better now you can do it, You have had your operation you should be on the mend now You should keep your self busy & you would not think about it, I could scream at some family & friends they think breast cancer is so easy I think some times they think I am putting it on But thank goodness we all have this fabulous site with fabulous friends we are always here for each other I can't explain it , but I have kind of stepped away from negative family & friends I don't want them in my way as they will make my body take longer to recover , they will stress me out , & I need all my energy for me not for them Hope every one is having a good bank hoilday week end love & hugs to all love Yvonne xxxx
Posts.Title: help feel awful at 2 radiotherapy to go

Posts.Content: Just thought I would say hello to every one hope every one is having a good day love n hugs to every one take care & give your self a big hug love Yvonne xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Hello all my lovely friends

Posts.Content: Hi Dreamthief my new medication is good no more pain fabulous eh? My hair is thinning out but rather have that as be in pain. Work is wearing me out only work 2 shifts a wk perm nite shift 12 hrs 8pm to 8am work has been fabulous with me but i'am struggling what is not helping I've got flu n I've never had flu this bad ever in my life sorry 4 twisting but i'am feeling very sorry for my self I just feel so poorly take good care love Yvonne xxxxx
Posts.Title: Hello all my lovely friends

Posts.Content: A massive thank you to all your understanding support believe it or not you have all made me feel a 100% better I can't believe how good I feel so a big thank you lots of love Yvonne xxxx
Posts.Title: I need to ask a very personal question?

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friends hope this Saturday morning finds every one having a good day. Last week Mr Clark my surgeon changed my medication to Exemestane I'am pleased to say they are working because my bones are not hurting now I seem to have more energy but I'am concerned because I'am convinced my hair is coming out not a lot but I'am sure it's starting to go thin & now I have become obsessed with my hair I can't help it do you think I am cracking up or going mad or just being silly I'am very grateful & happy that these tablets have taking my pain away but I'am worried about my hair has any one else on Exemestane tablets & had hair loss? I'am so very sorry for going on about my hair but I have no one else to ask take good care every one love and hugs to every one love Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: I'am sure my hair is coming out?

Posts.Content: good morning my lovely friends hope every one is having a good morning I need to ask a very personal question by asking my personal question if I up set any one I am very sorry because I don't want to up set any of my very brave friends on here. Here goes and i am not much good with the correct words so I will ask my question in words that I know . My husband and me don't have sex now because I don't want it , I get no feelings at all of wanting sex, I am 53 & my hubby is 54 we have a fabulous marriage we have had our ups & downs like every one but we have always worked through what ever together. It's a year this February the 18th since I was diagnosed with breast cancer so I've had my operation & radiothapy I just take my medication now Anastrozole/Exemestane & it works great for me, i'am also on Citalopram for my depression & anxiety & it works great for me so I don't want to come off my medication to try a different one. Is their a medication that I could take that would make me want to have sex with my hubby? Because I know that you have to have sex in a marriage, it's got to the stage now if I am on my day off I say to my self right i'am going to have sex tonight but then when night comes i'am in bed at 6-30 because I am worn out . I've spoke to my hubby about it he just keeps saying don't worry but I am getting very worried about it I keep thinking he's a man and may find some one to go with. I've never been or classed my self as a sexy woman in fact I have never enjoyed sex a lot of times I just pretended because as a small child I was sexually abused but my hubby knows all about this and he was fabulous when we first got married in fact he's fabulous now it's me because I know he must need sex any help I would be so grateful and if I have up set any of my very brave friends for been so forward I am sorry I can't ask any one else please help lots of love Yvonne xxxxxxx
Posts.Title: I need to ask a very personal question?

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely I am on the same medication as you Anastrozole ( Arimidex ) ( Exemestane) this is the second medication I have been given because I could not take my 1st meds as it effected my joints far too much. I am happy being on this medication but it could be different for you my lovely because we are all different and our medication effects us differently but the main side effect I have been on this medication is my hair, I had long think black hair & like you I never needed Cemo but my medication totally thinned my hair, completely dried my hair out , split it & it started coming out & breaking off I got it cut & it has been a lot better but still thin & very dry but I don't mind because I have very little joint pain with this medication pluss I've always been a very bad sleeper at night & this medication makes that worse so I am on sleeping tablets but again I don't mind because I get very little joint pain on these I get loads of hot sweats I don't like them but for me this Cancer medication works as before with the other medication my joint pain tuck over my life so for me it works but for you it may not work my lovely talk to your breast cancer nurse or your surgeon its all trying different medication to see what suits you best my lovely lots of love Yvonne xxxxx
Posts.Title: Anastrasole/Arimidex Questions (for invasive lobular breast cancer...

Posts.Content: Hello 3 weeks ago I was diagnosed with breast cancer I go in to hospital on Wednesday to have the cancer removed. I'am 52 stopped having my periods when I was about 42 but since I've been diagnosed with breast cancer I get dreadful hot flushes the heat my body feels you would think it was boiling from head to toe and the sweat runs down my body I'am not on any medication for my cancer does breast cancer cause hot flushes thanks Yvonne xx
Posts.Title: Hot flushers

Posts.Content: Hello first if i should not be on here if I am jumping the gun I am so very very sorry Can any one please answer my questions Got a lump in my breast Went for mammogram Sent to hospital Had scan Had a neddle Doc says your lump is cancerous doc has taken some tissue I go back next week Dose cancerous mean cancer Does cancerous mean my lump is migligment I can't think I feel lost I'am spinning with questions & information that I don't understand
Posts.Title: Feel lost

Posts.Content: Just like to thank every one for their help I phoned hospital up & spoke to my breast nurse who explained what doctor had told me last wk my lump in my breast is cancer I see the doctor nex wk to discuss my treatment I think it's just starting to sink in a bit more now what is happening I went shopping to day n had to come home I felt so poorly & afraid every one was normal & I was so afraid n I could feel my self getting up set for no reason it just came over me xxxxx
Posts.Title: Feel lost

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your very kind words and understanding and help and support live Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: Feel lost

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friends I feel so angry with everything & everyone, everything is getting on my nerves I could just scream, shout, and cry and this is not me everything is annoying me I went out for a lovely lunch today for Mother's Day with my daughter half way through the lunch my daughter starting crying and said " Mum I hate telling you lies & pretending all is good but my partner and me have split up & have been split up now for 4 weeks we have just decided to share our house and live together " I was so shocked my daughter is in bits and so hurt. My son has been in detox because he's an alcoholic he's doing very good and been out of hospital now for 2 weeks but been taking in to hospital with a chest infection my hubby who I love very much went out today and got drunk I had to pick him up and he had told some people that I have a new lump and that i'am going back on Tuesday for a scan I was so mad and angry and annoyed that my hubby had told some people my son knows nothing about my new lump because i'am afraid he may use it as an excuse to have a drink and some of his mates were in the pub. I don't know what to do first, scream, cry, shout, I am so mad, upset, and my poor daughter she is so hurt because her partner has got someone new i'am fed up lots of love Yvonne xxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: I just feel so angry with my self & everyone else

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for your reply I read it and read it again and your reply makes so much sense to me and yes I hope my hubby wakes up tomorrow with a very bad head ha ha thank you for helping me I needed it xxxxxx
Posts.Title: I just feel so angry with my self & everyone else

Posts.Content: Thank you so much for replying to me thank you doc tuck some thing with a injection from my lump & asked me to come back in an hour & an half doc sat me down said we have results your lump is cancerous I will take some tissue and I go back next week the doc n staff were fab it was me I just wanted to get out I never thought about it till this morning I find my self saying Have I got cancer what did doc mean it's cancerous are they doing tests to see if tissue is miglent cancerous or does miglent mean cancerous I just feel so lost and so alone I have a loving family but they want their questions answered and I can't answer them because I can't answer my questions But thank you so very much for your very kind and nice and quick reply thank you
Posts.Title: Feel lost

Posts.Content: Good morning all my lovely friends hope every one is having a fabulous morning I go for my check up Monday afternoon it's my 1st one after all my treatment & I feel good don't get worn out as much now after my Radiotherapy my boob is still blue but fading but my boob is still a little sore but not like it was but still get pain under my arm were glands were taking out i'am at dentists for check up Monday morning I think I have cancer in my mouth I have a lump in my mouth it don't hurt it's not sore it's been there a long time before I was diagnosed with breast cancer and while I I was having my Radiotherapy I notice a white spot next to my lump I thought I must be getting a sore mouth from my treatment but it don't hurt it's not sore but it's there and I have now convinced my self I have cancer in my mouth/gum I have false teeth ii keep thinking did the cancer first start there and then went. To my breast or did the cancer go from my breast to my mouth/gum? My gut instinct is telling me it's cancer i'am not down or worried about it I've just accepted it and I have not even been to my dentist yet have I finally lost it? Take care every one love n hugs always love Yvonne xxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: I think I may be over reacting ?????

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely , what your feeling is a normal reaction to Cancer I'am pleased you got some days planned going out for lunch , these early days I found were dreadful I would get tearful crying for I don't know what panic at any time I've started my treatment & have my operation tomorrow & I still get "what I call them nasty early days coming back" but not often now I feel more in control now So what your going thro is dreadful but it's the norm so to speak you just got to be very kind to your self your not going round the bend , your not cracking up, your still in shock and it's your body reacting to shock take good care my lovely love Yvonne xx
Posts.Title: Weird & Wobbly

Posts.Content: A big thank you to every one for all their support , kindness , help , understanding , and for being there for me thank you love Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: I must say sorry

Posts.Content: I must say sorry to every one and a big thank you to every one for all the support and good advice and for being there. I only been on for two weeks when doc told me I had breast cancer and every time I come on here I always moan n go on n twist I never say any thing nice love Yvonne xxxx
Posts.Title: I must say sorry

Posts.Content: hello my lovely friends it's our Arron's inquest tomorrow we have to be at The Coroners Court tomorrow morning at 9am I'm dreading it I wish it was over but I don't want it to be over its the 3rd time the inquest has been on & tomorrow it's the final time it's on love & hugs everyone love Yvonne xxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: My poor son's inquest tomorrow

Posts.Content: Ha ha i'am not mad I loved my surgeon Mr Clark he was just perfect love Yvonne xxx. This is the firt time I have ever admitted to it xx
Posts.Title: Did anyone else develop a teensy consultant crush during their treatment...

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friends our Arron's inquest was very sad , The Coroner was very kind, understanding & very professional. I don't know if it was all in my mind today or not but my boob felt so sore & painful I kept thinking about the phone call I had with our Az when I was diagnosed with breast cancer it was just after 5-30pm because I always waited until he finished work & was back in his flat when I told him I said everything is fine & ive got my date for my operation don't worry & our Arron being Arron said "Mum I'm coming home I will be there " I kept saying I'm fine you have got work but sure enough he was home in the early hours of the morning & when I went for my Radiotherapy because I live in Durham & my Arron lived in Kent I had to text him when I left for hospital & when I came back & he would phone we would have a chat a laugh God bless him I miss our Arron so very much thank you all for all your support love Yvonne xxxxx
Posts.Title: My poor son's inquest tomorrow

Posts.Content: Hello every one it's only my 3rd session of radiotherapy & my boob just feels like it's sun burnt but it's not there's nothing to see & yesterday when I got in I had to go to bed & I slept a few hours I was not expecting any side effects from my radiotherapy until the 3rd week I am starting to think am I a big softy , is it all in my head but I know it's not did any one else get early side effects or is it just me? Take care love Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: Radiotherapy only day 3

Posts.Content: Hi I've joined your club xxxx
Posts.Title: Four in the morning

Posts.Content: Hello Sianikb i'am so very sorry for all your heart break, pain, suffering and despair that you are having to live with every day and night of your life I can't find any words of comfort to say that would help you all I can say is, I know from my soul you are a very brave, understanding, caring, positive, loving lady and I am sending you all my love and cuddles to you lots of love Yvonne xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Stupid disease

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friends how is every one? Good I hope i'am sitting in living room & I feel sleepy but as soon as I go to bed i'am wide awake again i'am fed up of it. I have a million thoughts going round my head I've had a bad week ; Had a letter from my insurance BRIGHT GREY saying more or less I did not tell the truth when I filled forms in for critical illness so that looks like it's gone out the window My son who lives away is a recovering alcoholic & drug user he's been clean for a long time but last week end went out & got drunk & tuck god knows what I've returned back to work just one shift a week for now & plan more shifts later on but I don't think I will manage Because I've got the all clear from my hospital after my operation & radiotherapy every one now thinks I should be normal again & back to my self & I am far from that the Letrozole won't let me My depression has been back now for a couple of days & I can't seem to shake it off I go back to hospital next month to see my surgeon Mr Clark i'am not worried about it as I know my cancer has gone it's just for a check up I don't know what is wrong with me i'am sorry for not making sense & for going on about nothing just wish I could sleep I keep going over in my head what happened in February of this year when I was first diagnosed with breast cancer & find my self saying to my self why did I not ask this or that did I actually go thro that what was I thinking how did I come out the other end I have loads of questions I have asked my self & don't seem to be able to answer my own questions or i'am not happy with my answers sorry for going on take good care every one love Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: Sick of not being able to sleep

Posts.Content: Dare I say it ha ha nite nite & god bless I'am off to bed I feel so worn out I could cry so I don't care if I don't sleep I am just enjoying the rest in bed n relax love Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: Sick of not being able to sleep

Posts.Content: Morning my lovely I got a few hours but to day is a new day hope you have a good day love Yvonne xx
Posts.Title: Sick of not being able to sleep

Posts.Content: I start my treatment off Thursday just an assessment first then my operation on the 2nd don't know what to expect just having lump removed then radiotherapy I've been told that radiotherapy makes you feel worn out but don't know take care every one love & best wishes Yvonne xx
Posts.Title: Start of treatment

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friends I need help my daughter is so sad , stressed & depressed & when I was diagnosed with breast cancer that just was the iceing on the cake so to speak . I knew some thing was wrong with my daughter I kept asking her & all she would say was or nothing mum , she's 34 married her wife is a lovely girl they have been together now a long time years n years they both have good jobs . We have had loads of family meals together since I was dignosised with breast cancer but I've had my operation lump & glands removed on medication & start my Radiotherapy the 2nd of June so all is going fabulous my daughter is under her GP for depression & on medication & has been on the sick for it but is back to work now I need to help her but nothing is working any one got any ideas that may help my daughter for me to try please take care every one love & hugs Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: My daughter is so sad & depressed

Posts.Content: Sending you loads of love & hugs , don't try to do such a lot all at once my lovely everyday is different some days you may feel yes I can do that today I'am having a good day & other days you may feel like I could sleep all day do what your body is telling you what it wants but take your time love & hugs love Yvonne xxxx
Posts.Title: Feels as if I am going backwards a bit

Posts.Content: Thank you so much my lovely friend take care love Yvonne xx
Posts.Title: My daughter is so sad & depressed

Posts.Content: hello my lovely friends just want to wish everyone a good happy bank holiday week end, be nice & kind to yourself because we all deserve it lots of love always Yvonne xxxxx
Posts.Title: Happy Bank Holiday Wk End

Posts.Content: Hello every one hope you are all good , does every one who has an operation for breast cancer have drainage ? I have my operation to morrow I'am ok sort of it's just the drainage that's got me take good care every one Love Yvonne X
Posts.Title: Does drainage happen to every one ?

Posts.Content: morning my lovely friends my son Arron his death certificate arrived yesterday we miss him so much St Cuthbert's Hospice is helping us out loads with counselling they are fabulous people they helped me with my breast cancer I never thought afree getting through breast cancer that my son Arron would die at 32yrs old my son Arron is my rock love Yvonne xxxxx
Posts.Title: Our Arron's Death Certificate came yesterday

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friends hope every one is having a good day I'am sending you all my hugs I'am sending all my hugs if your having a bad day and a magic tissue just for you to put in your pocket and keep for when ever you need a little bit of reassurance . A big massive thank you to every one for all your kind replies , For all the help & support, For always being there, For always answering my questions , For always caring , I've been to hospital seen Mr Clark my surgeon , my operation was a success he removed my cancer lump & some glands , all I have to do now is take my tablets to stop my cancer returning & when I get my dates thro to go & start my Radiotherapy . Keep being strong , giving my self time to get over my operation , the swelling , the soreness. As a little girl I grow up telling my self " I'am a born survivor " I've said this thro my life with what ever came my way , but when I was diagnosed with breast cancer I stopped saying it I think I was in shock , but I'am so very pleased with my self as I have found my self saying this again. So thank you every one for helping me thro very dark days and thro very funny days Take care best wishes to every one love Yvonne xxxx
Posts.Title: A massive thank you to every one xxxx

Posts.Content: I love that thank you love Yvonne xxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: A massive thank you to every one xxxx

Posts.Content: hello all my lovely friends hope everyone is having a good day I had a bad week last week but it's starting to pick up a bit today lots of love & hugs to everyone love Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: Hello my lovely friends

Posts.Content: Thanks my lovely hope your keeping well & not over doing things & hope your having loads of good days & not too many bad days love Yvonne xx
Posts.Title: It's my 1st review today ?

Posts.Content: Hi how you keeping today ? Thanks because my appointment is at 2pm I think I am doing great with my Radiotherapy loads of good days not many bad days & my skin is fine my boob is a little sore & uncomfortable but that's all I still cry some days & I never know were i'am going to be it just comes over me it don't last long but it's strange my sick note runs out middle of July so I see how I feel take care and have a fabulous day & thank you my lovely love Yvonne xx
Posts.Title: It's my 1st review today ?

Posts.Content: Morning my lovely friends hope every one is keeping good, it's my 8th session of Radiotherapy today & my 1st review with Doc can any one tell me what I should expect please take care and hope every one of us has a fabulous day love Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: It's my 1st review today ?

Posts.Content: Thank you & I just love my picture you sent you made me smile thank you all for always being there for me xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Hello my lovely friends

Posts.Content: I've been diagnosed with breast cancer I have critical illness cover on my insurance so I've filled a claim form in. Sadly if your diagnosed with breast cancer and have critical illness cover on your insurance and put a claim in. Were you able to claim or were you refused dose any one know please love Yvonne xx
Posts.Title: Critical illness claim

Posts.Content: 3 weeks ago I was diagnosed with breast cancer, but totally convinced my self there's been a mistake . Even tho I had a mammogram , scan , biopsy , they all came back cancerous . I still told my self there's been a mistake , went to see my surgeon Mr Clark he's so nice n understanding I just sat n nodded because I knew he was wrong because I have not got cancer . My breast nurse is fabulous she's kind supporting I just agreed with her because she is so nice I thought I can't tell this nurse she's made a mistake . My Macmillan nurse is fab she's a lovely person so I could not tell her she's made a mistake . My GP is fantastic I can talk to him about out so I did not like to offend him by saying you have made a mistake . Then this morning I got my little card thro post that my GP filled in for me to get free prescriptions for 5 years , I've looked all day n held this little card & I'am starting to think all these professional people in good jobs can't be all wrong I think they may be right I think I've got breast cancer n I'am starting to panic a bit I think . What if they are all right but they must be right . I've done this all my life from being very little I block things out I pretend there not happening instead of dealing with things. And stupid little things I panic like mad over I've got all my letters upstairs from hospital with my hospital dates in what started out as one appointment n one letter is now 3 appointments n 3 letters I know they all can't be wrong n I don't know if this is making any sence but I could cry because I think there right love Yvonne I'll close now or I'll just go on n on xxx
Posts.Title: It's starting to seem real ?

Posts.Content: Thank you for your help n support in a way I'am pleased others felt the same way as I am feeling as I thought it was just me so thank you all so much love Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: It's starting to seem real ?

Posts.Content: Hello Poolm4n & welcome 2 our family iam sorry you have joined the club and I mean that in a nice way there is loads of help & support on here keep in touch with us all have a good afternoon best wishes , hope all my lovely friends have a good afternoon take care u all love Yvonne xx
Posts.Title: breast cancer in men

Posts.Content: Hello all my lovely friends I hope everyone is keeping good, I'm ok I guess having good days & bad days I just feel so very sad, a bit angry & I feel very guilty. I keep thinking I should of done more to help my son Arron it's so unfair our Arron was only 32 years old , I still do not believe I will never see my son ever again or talk to my son ever again it's not normal is it? Does any one know what will happen at The Coroners inquest? & where will The Coroners inquest be held at? Take good care all my lovely friends love & hugs always love Yvonne xxxxx
Posts.Title: Good days & bad days????

Posts.Content: Morning my lovely friends I've got a head flu from hell don't know what hurts most my chest , ears or my body I've never ever had flu like this . Do you think because of breast cancer when you get another thing like a common head cold it's worse ? Or any thing ? Does other common illnesses effect you more because of our breast cancer? Or i'am I just been a big softy ? Or is it all in my head? Take good care my lovely friends & have a good day love Yvonne xxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Head cold from hell

Posts.Content: Hi my lovely friends I had to give in today & go see my GP he says its a virus & a chest infection because my immune system is low got antibotics I'am in bed & I'am staying there it's knocked me off my feet I can't seem to fight it & I don't seem to want to fight it just saying to my body get on with it I don't care it hurts too much it's uncomfortable its a pain in bum hope every one is having a good day I'am having a weak day today & feeling very sorry for my self love Yvonne xxxx
Posts.Title: Head cold from hell

Posts.Content: Good morning my lovely friends hope everyone is having a good day? I'm having good hours & bad hours our St Cuthbert's Hospice Family Support Team is helping us with our son Arron we still can not accept that we will never ever see our Arron again my question is; I work part time 16 & a half hrs a wk yesterday was pay day & I got no pay am I entitled to sick pay ? I'm on minimum wage a care assistance last year when I was off with breast cancer I got paid but then I was full time I don't know who to ask I'm on the sick from my doctor & sick note says bereavement I know my pay is last thing to think of when my son Arron is God knows where I hope he's in heaven with my mum, dad, Aunty Doreen & my brother Malcolm we visit our Arron every Sunday & take flowers I wish the world would leave me alone n let me climb in to bed until this nightmare is over & I hate my self for been think I'm not intelligent I don't catch on fast if I had been intelligence my son our Arron would be here today & alive sorry for going on please does anyone know if I should get paid or not love to you all I have not been on for a while now because I'm not in a good place & I can't cheer anyone up on this lifeline so I thought it best just to stop off it love Yvonne xxxxxx
Posts.Title: I need some advice please?

Posts.Content: Hello Cbaz , My goodness you must be so shatted , I was shatted reading your post; Back to work ! House work ! My lovely friend please slow down , slow down , your doing far too much , your expecting far too much from your body & your self . You must do what your body is telling you to do & that's Sit Down And Rest I know it's so frustrating being shatted when you look around at all the things that need doing . You have done fabulous you have had your operation & now it's time too heal your inner self with love , care , rest and patience with your self . I had my op last month & now waiting for a date to start my Radiotherapy I still get frustrated at times when I want to do house work or stuff & my body says "Well I won't do it " so I just say " ok you win I will rest u & let you watch tv " Take good care have a rest put your feet up love Yvonne xx
Posts.Title: Tired

Posts.Content: Good Morning yes it's a Good Morning today my lovely friends Yip-Pee!!!! Thank you 4 all the help , support , & very helpfull replies yesterday I think I just needed to hear , Your body needs comfort as well , We all get these bad days & some times you just have to go along with the bad day , Your not alone , Thank you it's helped me so much I've woke up this morning feeling good . I just never knew or thought about it that Cancer comes with so much baggage until I got breast cancer I just never knew but thank goodness I've got all my lovely friends on here it's a god send so hope every one has a good day love Yvonne & thank you all xxxxx
Posts.Title: I've had such a bad day

Posts.Content: Hope all my lovely friends have a very merry Christmas take good care & don't for get to give your self a big hug today love Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: Just like to see A Merry Christmas

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friends I've had a very bad day to day I'am so shattered all I've done today is feed my pigeons see to my dog I got up at 7am & at 10am went back to bed been feeling so down & all alone & my family & friends are very good I've had no energy all day my depression has won to day I could not fight it or make it go back to sleep I'am in medication for it & citopram works very good I can't control my eating since I started taking Letrozole I'am piling the wight on still got a blue boob I start my Radiotherapy June the 2nd I've beening doing great keeping on top of every thing but to day I just don't know what happened I've done nothing & I'am shattered depressed fed up I just hope I have a better day tomorrow & hope I sleep tonight love to every one Yvonne xxxx
Posts.Title: I've had such a bad day

Posts.Content: Hi Fadima hope your having a good night I wrote a post like yours not so long ago as my operation was a success , i had finished my radiotherapy had follow up appointments at hospital with docs & just have to take Exemestane for 5 years , I got the all clear , but I could not understand why I was not jumping around, why was I not my normal self, why was I not me, why was me still lost, and we're was I lost at. All these questions & no answers but with loads of help & support from all my lovely friends from this site I got to a safe place but a different place that was new to me. I still have times were I go out of my way & look for my normal self but I only confuse my self as that place has gone i'am not lost i have just moved to a new bright better place were my new me lives. It's so very hard for me to explain but what your going thro is all normal after cancer you have to learn to take your time take one day at a time remember your in recovery from breast cancer and it's so hard you will have bad days & good days for me being in recovery from breast cancer is much harder than my breast cancer ever was just take one day at a time take good care love n hugs Yvonne xxxx . Hope my text is a little helpful & you can understand the way I write things down as I repeat my self & I tend to ramble on a bit xxxx
Posts.Title: feeling sad and angry after having had breast cancer

Posts.Content: When I think about it we are bound to feel discomfort for a while I think at times ive convinced my self that is was not cancer I had it was some thing else so surely my boob must be better now if that makes any sense love Yvonne x
Posts.Title: Is this normal??

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely no I've managed to stop my self from prodding my boob & it tuck some doing so may be with me stop prodding my boob may be the soreness is coming out now i'am going to give it to the end of January & if it's still sore I will phone my nurse up & my right arm some times feels like it's got a bit cramp in it love Yvonne xxxx
Posts.Title: Is this normal??

Posts.Content: Hello my lovely friends hope every one has had a good day , is this normal my boob is painfu but it's not & my boob aches but it does not I know that sounds silly but I first starting to notice beginning of December that my boob starting to be painful & ached & was very sore & uncomfortable but it's not but it is I know I am not making any sense it will be a year next month that I was first diagnosed with breast cancer & my boob is getting more sore now i'am sure it is or is this all in my head take good care my lovely friends lots of love Yvonne xxxxx
Posts.Title: Is this normal??

Posts.Content: Yes I go back to see Mr Clark the end of April I think he said the last time I seen him my next appointment ( that's April ) I will be having a manna gram or scan or some think then I hope to be discharged because I get my medication from my GP love Yvonne xxx
Posts.Title: Is this normal??

Posts.Content: Hello every one hope every one is having good days. Do you think this is normal , I've had my operation lump removed some glands removed had my Radiotherapy on Letrozole now all this tuck place 6 month ago . But the last week or so my boob has become very sore , tender , swollen , uncomfortable to touch do you think it's normal for this to happen ? Love to all my lovely family on our family site love Yvonne xxxxx
Posts.Title: Do you think this is normal ?

Posts.Content: Thanks Denise I've done nothing as well good luck for Friday pet xxxx
Posts.Title: Do you think this is normal ?

Posts.Content: Thanks Lady Pepys not sure what that is I think it's the glands ? Maybe that's why it's so painful but I have not got a temp but I think I will go to docs just in case it's my glands under my arm I think I'am making it worse because I keep feeling my boob I keep checking for lumps I know that's stupid because when I was first diagnosed with breast cancer in February I had no pain in my boob it was not even uncomfortable this is how stupid I am I thought my boobs were growing but the problem was I would say "I've only got one boob growing & getting big" as I've always had little boobs ha ha xxxxx
Posts.Title: Do you think this is normal ?

Posts.Content: Happy new year my lovely lets all have a fabulous 2015 xxxx
Posts.Title: Good Morning 2015
